title: What If
body:
I've been thinking for awhile now about the diversity and uniqueness that is the roster of champions in League, and I really like coming up with interesting concepts for unique ways in which the characters interact with one another, and how those interactions could be applied in game. 
A couple of examples would be something like Ezreal and Lux having a very slight boost to stats when paired up in the bot lane, because they're a romantic couple, or Shen and Zed dealing unique extra damage to each other. 
Other examples of unique interaction with the game could be Brand not being able to be Ignited, because honestly, it doesn't make sense for a being of fire to be hurt by. . .fire. Instead, Nami and Fizz might deal just a little bit more damage to him with water based skills. Nami taking a little more damage from Kennen, etc. Kind of similar to Pokemon and the type interactions. Another thing I thought would be cool is if an allied Janna shot her Q through allied Yasuo's windwall, maybe it could expand and have a bigger hitbox. It's little combinations like that between champs that I find fun to think of. I understand if micro-interactions like that would be super difficult to do without more bugs and crashes and problems, but if you guys ever get to a point where you can do something like this, I'd love to see it. Thanks!
